A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had SUCH HIGH HOPES for this turd sandwich of a movie. The first scene is actually pretty good but after that it goes down like the Titanic. Plot holes abound\, character development stinks\, forced humor and really just bad acting. Laura Dern was such a bad choice! Even Benicia Del Toro\, who I otherwise think is great\, wasn’t right for the role. I honestly think that Disney paid off all of the people who saw early screenings! They knew they had an awful film and are trying to squeeze out every dime they can before people start reading honest reviews like this one. I have waited in line on opening night for every star wars film since they rereleased the originals in theaters. I won’t be next time.
